short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically accepts Faceit matches when they are ready

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Faceit Auto Accept is a convenient Chrome extension designed for avid Faceit players. It simplifies your gaming experience by automatically accepting matches for you when they're ready. With this extension, you no longer have to worry about missing the accept button or being distracted while waiting for a match to start.
